title: Add git vendor icons and multi-provider support
description:
Add visual indicators for git providers (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, Gitea, Azure DevOps) on folders containing linked repositories. Extends the database schema to support multiple git vendors beyond GitHub.

## Changes
- Add provider field to githubRepositories table
- Create GitProviderIcon component with brand icons
- Update Sidebar to show vendor icons on folders
- Update RepositoryPicker to display provider info
- Update types and services to include provider metadata
close_reason: Implementation complete - added git vendor icons and multi-provider support

title: GitHub OAuth integration and repository picker
close_reason: Implemented GitHub OAuth account linking, repository picker, and branch picker components
